steps_string:
Steps( Begin(), 
Put(number_in_box(9), into_box(2)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(4), 1), increase(1)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(9), 1), number_in_box(8)), then_go_to_step(5), then_go_to_step(4)),
Operation(Multiply(), number_in_box(2), number_in_box(3), put_result_into_box(3)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(4), 1), number_in_box(6)), then_go_to_step(7), then_go_to_step(6)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(1), 2), number_in_box(5)), then_go_to_step(7), then_go_to_step(1)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(9), 1), increase(1)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(9), 1), increase(1)),
Put(number_in_box(4), into_box(6)), End())
question: What number is now in Box 3?
question_zh: 经过以上操作之后，现在3号盒子中的数字是多少?
desc: Put ( number in box 9 ) into box 2
Change Instruction 4: Increase the first box number mentioned in it by 1
Is the first box number mentioned in Instruction 9 greater than ( number in box 8 )
Multiply: ( number in box 2 ) * ( number in box 3 ), put result into box 3.
Is the first box number mentioned in Instruction 4 greater than ( number in box 6 )
Is the second box number mentioned in Instruction 1 greater than ( number in box 5 )
Change Instruction 9: Increase the first box number mentioned in it by 1
Change Instruction 9: Increase the first box number mentioned in it by 1
Put ( number in box 4 ) into box 6
